Author: Kirin
Name: Truth or Dare
Description:
Automated Truth or Dare roll management for FFXIV social events.

Features:
• Monitors chat for /random roll results automatically
• Determines winners based on highest rolls with smart tiebreaking
• Tracks and excludes previous round winners
• Identifies 'strippers' (rolls ≤100) for penalty rounds
• Configurable roll timeout and player management
• Easy-to-copy results for /yell announcements

Perfect for automating Truth or Dare games at FC events, parties, and social gatherings. Just start the game, have everyone /random, and let the plugin handle the rest!
